attributes.action: Make Ordnance Survey (mapping) data freely available to the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The licensing cost of using Ordnance Survey data is a significant barrier to technical and business innovation in any field that relies on good quality mapping or geographic data. The virtual monopoly on raw data stifles competition in these business areas.

Make this data freely available to the public.
